body.p: A slightly belated "Welcome to 2005" from the staff of the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter, which this weeks draws your attention to a remarkable milestone: 1000 days of Gentoo Forums! Congratulations to the moderators and administrators are followed by portraits of many of the people behind that success. Project updates on documentation and website redesign, and a call for additional Polish translators and several of the usual sections are back this year, too: Gentoo Security, Bugzilla statistics, Gentoo in the Press, and to round it all up we have a look at the crowd of GentooJP, the amazing group of Gentooists in Japan who met for their annual Bounenkai last week. Enjoy this first issue of Volume 4 of the GWN!
